name: after-dark
description: A robust, elegant dark theme for Hugo.
author: Josh Habdas <josh@habd.as> (https://habd.as/)

scripts.update:lazysizes: yarn upgrade lazysizes && cp -i node_modules/lazysizes/lazysizes.min.js static/js
scripts.update:hackcss: yarn upgrade hackcss && cat node_modules/hack/dist/hack.css > static/css/critical-vendor.css && cat node_modules/hack/dist/dark.css >> static/css/critical-vendor.css
scripts.update:photoswipe: yarn upgrade hackcss && cp -i node_modules/photoswipe/dist/photoswipe.css static/css/vendor/photoswipe/ && cp -ir node_modules/photoswipe/dist/default-skin static/css/vendor/photoswipe/ && cp -i node_modules/photoswipe/dist/photoswipe.min.js static/js/vendor/photoswipe/ && cp -i node_modules/photoswipe/dist/photoswipe-ui-default.min.js static/js/vendor/photoswipe/
scripts.test: while true; do head -n 100 /dev/urandom; sleep 0.1; done | hexdump -C | grep 'ca fe'
